channel.title: Jekyll on Faguo Cao
channel.description: Recent content in Jekyll on Faguo Cao

item.title: Mac安装Jekyll
item.author: hunter_cao@163.com (Hunter)
item.description: Mac安装Jekyll 安装测试于MacOS 10.12 依赖：appstore安装Xcode(约4GB), Command Line Tools(xcode-select –install) Ruby version 2.1 以上, 包括库及头文件 https://help.github.com/articles/adding-a-new-ssh-key-to-your-github-account/ https://help.github.com/articles/generating-a-new-ssh-key-and-adding-it-to-the-ssh-agent/#adding-your-ssh-key-to-the-ssh-agent /usr/bin/ruby -e "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install)" brew install ruby sudo gem install bundler sudo gem install jekyll jekyll -v jekyll new blogs cd blogs jekyll serve jekyll serve --detach #后台运行 title：文章内部标题 date：日期 categories：标签；目前只能有一个标签
